Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that David Hogg is a survivor of the Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School shooting and attended the school in Florida.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that David Hogg is an actor, when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it provides no evidence or sources to back up the assertion that David Hogg went to high school in California.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that David Hogg being in California at one point means he went to high school there and is an actor.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that David Hogg visited California but relocated to Florida before starting high school.
